rationale: Art making skill — physical technique, material handling, and creative assessment require specialist teacher.
notes: AI can support art appreciation and analysis; physical making needs expert demonstration and assessment.

rationale: Art history/knowledge concept — factual content about artists, movements, and techniques deliverable digitally with visual resources.
